settings.text_title: MEET TERASANA
settings.text_body:
Seriously effective green skincare. Packed with pristine ingredients and lots of love.

Available this summer.

settings.text_title:
Natural ingredients.
Supernatural results.
Extraordinary skincare.

Natural ingredients.
Supernatural results.
Extraordinary skincare.

Apply. Beautify.
Repeat.
settings.text_body: Ancient tradition and cutting-edge science meet in this one-of-a-kind oil that harnesses fermentation for extraordinary hydration and skin-perfecting power. A truly luxurious formula at a surprisingly affordable price.

settings.text_title:
Glow from
head to toe.
settings.text_body: When modern life leaves skin feeling dry and dull, let Good Nature wrap your body in green, rejuvenating nourishment you can see in the mirror. Made with nutrient-packed seed oils, this balm brings well-being and happiness to all it touches.

settings.text_title:
Deep repair.
Powered by
nature.
settings.text_body: We brought together skin-plumping hyaluronic acid and Vitamin-C rich Kakadu plum to make a serum with collagen-boosting goodness unmatched by other anti-aging beauty products. Wrinkles and fine lines don’t stand a chance.

settings.text_title: Deeply moisturizing and the scent is amazing. Every day is a spa day!
The facial oil was my favorite! The scent and texture fit perfectly into my daily routine.
Terasana Collections
Really good products for really good people.

Really good
products for really
good people.
Ingredients without compromise.
settings.text_body: Terasana means “brilliant Earth”– so it’s no coincidence that our ingredients are lovingly and ethically sourced from every corner of the planet. Each of our formulations feature wide bouquets of green goodness, in combinations that feel amazing and truly change skin for the better. From the beginning, Terasana has been 100% vegan, cruelty-free and untouched by harmful chemicals. It’s not the easy way to do things, but it’s the only way worthy of the body that’s yours.

settings.text_image_custom_classes: flex items-center justify-center pt2 w-70-ns w-100 center
settings.text_title: Ingredients without compromise.
settings.text_body: Terasana means “brilliant Earth”– so it’s no coincidence that our ingredients are lovingly and ethically sourced from every corner of the planet. Each of our formulations feature wide bouquets of green goodness, in combinations that feel amazing and truly change skin for the better. From the beginning, Terasana has been 100% vegan, cruelty-free and untouched by harmful chemicals. It’s not the easy way to do things, but it’s the only way worthy of the body that’s yours.

settings.text_title: Packed with care.
settings.text_body: Every element of Terasana's packaging is designed to enhance the effectiveness of our formulas and minimize their environmental footprint. Terasana’s signature vessels limit plastic consumption while keeping our prized ingredients protected from impurities. Our boxes, too, are made with 100% recycled and recyclable paper. And for many products, Terasana develops beautiful, creative ways to give our vessels a second life around your home.

settings.text_title: Wellness for your <br class="dn-ns">entire self.
settings.text_body: Scent plays an extremely important role in human mood and well-being—that’s why our products are gently scented with 100% pure essential oils in amounts that are 100% safe for use on skin. Terasana’s in-house fragrance experts craft blends inspired by ancient Ayurvedic traditions of healing and balance, creating subtle, sophisticated scents folks fall in love with.

settings.text_title: Giving back for a <br class="dn-ns">greener future.
settings.text_body: With all that Mother Nature provides, it’s important to return the favor however we can. In that regard, Terasana couldn’t ask for a partner more perfect than One Tree Planted. Every Terasana purchase helps One Tree Planted replenish forests struck by wildfires and other disasters, as part of a global effort to create healthier, more beautiful ecosystems.

settings.title: Lauren Lane
settings.content:
I feel great knowing some of my favorite products are clean and contain quality natural ingredients. I’m obsessed with the facial oil…
it saved my skin!
If You Want Smoother, More Radiant Skin, You Should Be Using Terasana's Skin Mantra.

settings.text_title: We make skincare good for the body and good for the soul.
settings.text_body: Terasana is natural skincare brand of a higher standard. Our powerfully green products make it possible for everybody to enjoy healthy, glowing skin while steering clear of sketchy ingredients and shady ethics. So you can feel just as good about using Terasana, as using Terasana feels good on you.
